Back in late 2009, I was managing my booming design and marketing business, Zurek Design.

beforethey know if it will make money?

I do, apparently!

Once I swallowed the fear of investing that much to learn something new, things started happening for me.

  • My books are well-received and much loved â€” and deliver income to me every single month
  • People find my website and join my community every day, all year long
  • Iâ€™m able to travel anywhere Iâ€™d like because my business fits in my backpack
  • I can â€œdial upâ€ or â€œdial backâ€ my working hours as needed because I have complete control over my schedule

You wouldnâ€™t have read this far if you didnâ€™t also want to build this kind of online business!

How to use Plan & Grow BIG to get the business focus mindset you need

GET THE QUIZ: INSTANT DOWNLOAD!

As we go through each stage of the Plan & Grow BIG approach, I want you to identify areas of opportunity for your current situation.

Letâ€™s get started.

The four simple stages of Plan & Grow BIG

The Plan Stage: Think and dream productively

Itâ€™s the early days of your business.

Think BIG. And work only on whatâ€™s needed in this stage.

In the PLAN stage, make these your business focus:

  • Pinpoint your ideal customer:Who will your online business serve? Warning: many people try to skip this step â€” donâ€™t! You need to become acquainted with the people you want to reach and help before you build your branding and offers.
  • Get your branding in place:The earlier the better when it comes to
    building your brand. Youâ€™ll want to decide your business name and
    tagline, select your brand colors, and choose your brand fonts.

The Implement Stage: Iterate to find what works

But growth usuallyÂ doesÂ feel uncomfortable, doesnâ€™t it?

The IMPLEMENT stage may last for a while and thatâ€™s perfectly fine. Hereâ€™s what youâ€™ll focus on while youâ€™re there:

At this stage, you should explore innovative ways to grow your subscriber list â€” think webinars, guest posts, challenges, etc. The exception to email list building? If you offer a customized service to an exclusive group of people, you can focus on building areferral network.
  • Discover what works for launching your products and services.Launches are a nerve-wracking but important facet of online business. Aim to discover what launch techniques work best for your audience.

But once youâ€™ve hit on a winning product or service, youâ€™ll be ready for â€¦

The Grow Stage: Leverage your success

In the GROW stage, youâ€™ve hit on a product or service that converts reliably in your business â€” and now youâ€™ll focus on leveraging that success.

  • Add more revenue streams:As you dial into whatâ€™s working well, you may uncover your customersâ€™ unmet needs and build additional lines of business to serve them. Youâ€™ll move through the BUILD, IMPLEMENT, and GROW stages as you develop each new revenue stream.

The GROW stage is a pretty amazing place to be! At this stage, revenues are reliable and youâ€™re able to make some serious investments in your business.

Ready? Set? Business focus!

Now that you know your business stage (you DID download the quiz, right?), you can tap into the power of focused attention and make fast progress. Ignore all the techniques youâ€™ll need in future stages, and just aim to master the stage youâ€™re in.

Get the Online Business Success Roadmap for an overview and a handy checklist of all the Plan & Grow BIG stages.

When you do this, you can count on steady business growth â€” with less frustration and more confidence because youâ€™re focused on the right thing at the right time.

The next BIG challenge is â€¦

Now that youâ€™re clear about how to use a focused approach to eliminate frustration and make faster progress, hereâ€™s the next big online business challenge â€¦

Becoming a â€œvisibleâ€ and public leader in your space.

This was a HUGE stumbling block for me.

In the next article, Iâ€™m going to share my mindset tips and tricks to help you become more comfortable with becoming a visible online leader. Once you embrace the increased visibility that comes with building an online business, youâ€™ll see all sorts of interesting doors open up.

Your go-forward plan for business focus

The BIG question is, how do you successfully shape an online business dream into a viable online business that gives you the income, freedom, and recognition you deserve?

It comes down to business focus. Which is easy once you knowÂ whatÂ to focus on, and what to ignore.

Once youâ€™ve built that business, you have to stand out in front of it and represent it in your marketing, on social media, and at in-person events.

If you donâ€™t master this, youâ€™ll severely limit your reach and your impact. So how do you get comfortable with this increased visibility?

How can you step up and embrace the â€œinternet limelight?â€ Because once you do, online doors will open for you!

Read about that topic in the next article in this series, How to Adopt an Online Leader Success Mindset.
